name: Nema
description:
Prologue:

Play as the crystal sage Nema and fight to defend the pylons on the Great Turtle Island. You are tasked with the job of taking care of this particular island and must defend the pylons of the Great Turtle Island from the darkness that ensues to drain it of its energy!

Hop into this chill and cute third person shooter and survive the many enemies that are planning to steal the energy from the Great Turtle Island!

Controls:

WASD - Mouse to aim - Left click to shoot - Right click to spray water - Right click on water to refill your water

Controller Tips: Water!

- Right clicking will emit water from your wand, spray the ground and launch yourself, right clicking water will refill your handy water orb.

Magic Blast!

- Left clicking will blast a charge particle beam, hit enemies and zap them back to wherever they came from!

Crystals!

- Crystals get hot over time and need to be cooled off, when pylons get hot enemies are able to pinpoint your location, take care of them or they will get destroyed and the turtle will no longer be able to sail!

Powerups!

- Powerups spawn around the island to help you out, they come in a few different forms:
Movement Speed Increase - x2 movement speed
Rapid Fire - Shoot way faster
Water Drop - Increases max water storage
Skull - Increases damage
Heal - Heal the lowest health pylon by a little
